attributes.contentHtml:
Your TOS and Privacy Policies are not complete, website looks really awful and level 3 boosts gotten by breaking TOS (I doubt Nyan has $150 to spend in each server he boosts).
Plans are not displayed publicly, paypal.me billing system using PayPal Buttons.
A lot of stuff wrong with your new host...
Also stop alting you loser

attributes.bio: bullying 5 year old host owners isn’t just a hobby, it’s a lifestyle, a reason to breathe, an escape from this cruel world filled with thieves. It’s art, the first gift you open on xmas /j
